text: @senatemajldr @JudyWoodruff @NewsHour State & local govts being crushed by economic slowdown due to #COVID19 . I agree state pensions should not be bailed out. So how about agreeing to aid for state & local govts IF they agree to eliminate annual COLA's for multitude of pensions over 100K? Win for taxpayers.
